alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 2:43PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 315 PM PDT... At 243 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Clover Valley, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clover Valley and Angel Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
